languages.text:
Основополагающие параметры персонажа, от которых зависят значения его навыков, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, шанса на {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} и многого другого. У каждой характеристики есть соответствующий ей {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g}. Бонус характеристики равен значению десятков в характеристике. Например, у персонажа с Силой 41 будет бонус Силы равный 4, а у персонажа с Силой 52 бонус будет равен 5. Всего в игре девять характеристик:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g} (ББ)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g} (ДБ)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Сила (СИЛ){/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливость{/g} (ВЫН)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкость{/g} (ЛВК)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g} (ИНТ)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} (ВОС)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g} (ВОЛ)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительность{/g} (ОБЩ)</indent>

Basic parameters which define a character's skill scores, number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and many other aspects. Each characteristic has its own corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. A characteristic's bonus is equal to the digit in the tens place of the characteristic's value. For example, if a character's Strength is equal to 41, their Strength bonus is +4 and if their Strength is equal to 52, their Strength bonus is +5. There are 9 characteristics in the game in total:

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR)</indent>

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} (FEL)</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Basic parameters which define a character's skill scores, amount of wounds, hit chance, and many other things. Each characteristic has its corresponding bonus. A characteristic's bonus is equal to the digit in the tens place of the characteristic's value. For example, if a character's Strength is equal to 41, their Strength bonus is 4 and if their Strength is equal to 52, their Strength bonus is 5. There are 9 characteristics in the game in total:
- Weapon Skill (WS)
- Ballistic Skill (BS)
- Strength (STR)
- Toughness (TGH)
- Agility (AGI)
- Intelligence (INT)
- Perception (PER)
- Willpower (WP)
- Fellowship (FEL)

languages.text:
Grundlegende Parameter, die die Fertigkeitswerte eines Charakters, die Anzahl der {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, die {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} und viele andere Aspekte definieren. Jede Eigenschaft hat einen entsprechenden {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}. Der Bonus einer Eigenschaft entspricht der Zehnerstelle des Wertes der Eigenschaft. Wenn die Stärke eines Charakters zum Beispiel 41 beträgt, ist sein Stärke-Bonus +4, beträgt seine Stärke 52, ist sein Stärke-Bonus +5. Insgesamt gibt es 9 Eigenschaften:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} (WF)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähgkeit{/g} (BF)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} (STÄ)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g} (ZÄH)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} (BEW)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} (INT)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} (WAH)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} (WK)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} (GEF)</indent>

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR)</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Grundlegende Parameter, die die Fertigkeitswerte eines Charakters, die Anzahl der Wunden, die Trefferchance und viele andere Dinge definieren. Jede Eigenschaft besitzt einen entsprechenden Bonus. Der Bonus einer Eigenschaft entspricht der Zehnerstelle des Wertes der Eigenschaft. Wenn die Stärke eines Charakters zum Beispiel 41 beträgt, ist sein Stärke-Bonus 4, und wenn seine Stärke 52 beträgt, ist sein Stärke-Bonus 5. Insgesamt gibt es 9 Eigenschaften im Spiel:
– Waffenfertigkeit (WF)
– Ballistik-Fertigkeit (BF)
– Stärke (STÄ)
– Zähigkeit (ZÄH)
– Beweglichkeit (BEW)
– Intelligenz (INT)
– Wahrnehmung (WAH)
– Willenskraft (WK)
– Gefolgschaft (GEF)

languages.text:
Paramètres de base qui déterminent le score des différentes compétences d'un personnage, le nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de sa réserve, ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g}, etc. Chaque caractéristique possède son propre {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Ce bonus est égal au chiffre des dizaines de la valeur de la caractéristique. Par exemple, si la Force d'un personnage est égale à 41, le bonus de Force de celui-ci est de 4, et si sa Force est égale à 52, son bonus de Force est de 5. Au total, le jeu comporte 9 caractéristiques :
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} (CA)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Compétence balistique{/g} (CB)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Force{/g} (FOR)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} (END)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} (AGI)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g} (VOL)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} (SOC)</indent>
languages.original_text:
Basic parameters which define a character's skill scores, number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and many other aspects. Each characteristic has its own corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. A characteristic's bonus is equal to the digit in the tens place of the characteristic's value. For example, if a character's Strength is equal to 41, their Strength bonus is +4 and if their Strength is equal to 52, their Strength bonus is +5. There are 9 characteristics in the game in total:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} (TGH)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} (AGI)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} (WP)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} (FEL)</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Paramètres de base qui déterminent le score des différentes compétences d'un personnage, le nombre de blessures de sa réserve, ses chances d'infliger un coup, etc. Chaque caractéristique possède son propre bonus. Ce bonus est égal au chiffre des dizaines de la valeur de la caractéristique. Par exemple, si la Force d'un personnage est égale à 41, le bonus de Force de celui-ci est de 4, et si sa Force est égale à 52, son bonus de Force est de 5. Au total, le jeu comporte 9 caractéristiques :
- Compétence d'Arme (CA)
- Compétence Balistique (CB)
- Force (FOR)
- Résistance (RES)
- Agilité (AGI)
- Intelligence (INT)
- Perception (PER)
- Volonté (VOL)
- Fraternité (FRA)

languages.text:
角色的基本属性决定了角色的技能、最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}，以及许多其他相关参数。每项属性都有各自的属性{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。属性加值等同于属性值除以10，向下取整。例如，某个角色的力量属性为41，则该角色的力量属性加值就是+4，如果该角色的力量为57，则该角色的力量属性加值就是+5。游戏中共有9项属性：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}</indent>

- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}</indent>

languages.text:
Parámetros básicos que determinan las habilidades, las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} y muchos otros aspectos de un personaje. Cada característica proporciona una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} correspondiente. La bonificación de una característica es igual al dígito de decenas de la característica. Por ejemplo, un personaje con una puntuación de 41 en Fuerza tiene una bonificación de +4, mientras que uno con 52 de Fuerza tiene una bonificación de +5. Hay 9 características en el juego:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} (HA)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} (HP)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} (FUE)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} (RES)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} (AGI)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence} Inteligencia{/g} (INT)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception} Percepción{/g} (PER)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} (VOL)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} (EMP)</indent>
languages.original_text:
Basic parameters which define a character's skill scores, number of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}, and many other aspects. Each characteristic has its own corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. A characteristic's bonus is equal to the digit in the tens place of the characteristic's value. For example, if a character's Strength is equal to 41, their Strength bonus is +4 and if their Strength is equal to 52, their Strength bonus is +5. There are 9 characteristics in the game in total:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} (WS)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g} (BS)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} (STR)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} (TGH)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} (AGI)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (INT)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} (PER)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} (WP)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} (FEL)</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Parámetros básicos que determinan las {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidades{/g}, las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} y muchos otros aspectos de un personaje. Cada característica proporciona una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} correspondiente. La bonificación de una característica es igual al dígito de decenas de la característica. Por ejemplo, un personaje con una puntuación de 41 en {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} tiene una bonificación de 4, mientras que uno con 52 de Fuerza tiene una bonificación de 5. Hay 9 características en el juego:
- {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} (HA)
- {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g} (HP)
- Fuerza (FUE)
- {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} (RES)
- {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} (AGI)
- {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} (INT)
- {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} (PER)
- {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} (VOL)
- {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} (EMP)

languages.text:
キャラクターのスキルスコア、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}、その他多くのものを定義する基本パラメータ。各キャラクターは自身に対応する{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を持つ。特性ボーナスは特性値の10の位の桁に等しい。例えば、キャラクターの腕力が41だったら腕力ボーナスは4、52だったら5である。全部でゲーム内に9の特性がある：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}（WS）</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}（BS）</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}(STR)</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}（TGH）</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}（AGI）</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g} (INT)</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}（PER）</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}（WP）</indent>
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}（FEL）</indent>

Each characteristic has its own corresponding {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. A characteristic's bonus is equal to the digit in the tens place of the characteristic's value. languages.text:
Bir karakterin yetenek değerleri, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} gibi pek çok özelliğini tayin eden temel paramatreler. Her niteliğin kendine has {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g} bulunur. Bir niteliğin bonusu, o niteliğin değerinin onlar basamağındaki rakamına eşittir. Örneğin karakterin Kuvvet'i 41'e eşitse Kuvvet bonusu +4, 52'ye eşitse Kuvvet bonusu +5'tir. Oyunda toplamda 9 nitelik bulunmaktadır:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} (SİY)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g} (BAY)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} (KUV)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} (DAY)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} (ÇEV)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} (ZEK)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} (ALG)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} (İRA)</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} (SYL)</indent>
